title: nInnaiyE rati enru
sahitya:
ninnaiyE rati enru ninaikkirEnaDi kaNNammA tannaiyE shashiyenru sharaNameidinEn


caraNam 1    ponnaiyE tighartta mEni minnaiyE nighartta kAyar-pinnaiyE nitya kanniyE kaNNammA
    caraNam 2    mAra nambugaLen mIdu vri vAri vIsha nI kaN pArAyO vandu shErAyO kaNNammA
    caraNam 3    yAvumE sukha munikkOr IshanAmenakkun tOTram mEvumE ingu yAvumE kaNNammA
